md:
giải nghĩa từ "pictured" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Pictured (verb) - được miêu tả, được miêu tả bằng hình ảnh
	* Meaning: to be shown or represented in a picture or image.
	* Example: The famous actress was pictured on the cover of the magazine.
	* Related words: depict, illustrate, portray, represent.
2. Pictured (past tense of "picture") - hình dung, tưởng tượng
	* Meaning: to imagine or form a mental image of something.
	* Example: I pictured myself on a beautiful beach, relaxing and enjoying the sun.
	* Related words: imagine, envision, visualize, conceive.

Note: The verb "picture" can also mean to take a photograph of someone or something, but this meaning is not directly related to the verb "pictured" in the above examples.

  2. Pictured (past tense of "picture") - hình dung, tưởng tượng
    • Meaning: to imagine or form a mental image of something.
    • Example: I pictured myself on a beautiful beach, relaxing and enjoying the sun.
    • Related words: imagine, envision, visualize, conceive.

Note: The verb "picture" can also mean to take a photograph of someone or something, but this meaning is not directly related to the verb "pictured" in the above examples.
